MEDIA_TEAM.title: Media Team
MEDIA_TEAM.description: The Media Team helps share the story of what God is doing using media and technology. From capturing powerful moments to creating visuals and videos that inspire, this team uses creativity and technology to make sure every message reaches hearts â€” both in person and online.

PRAISE_WORSHIP_TEAM.title: Praise & Worship Team
PRAISE_WORSHIP_TEAM.description: The Praise & Worship Team leads our congregation into meaningful encounters with God through music. They create an atmosphere of praise that invites the Holy Spirit to move and draws us closer to His presence.
